name: For the captain. For the ship.
name_original: For the captain. For the ship.
description:
You are a pirate of the seven islands.  Pay you  debt to the devil and live long and happy life. Feel the trill of the duels to the dead, sell your lives, do what ever you want. But remember this, always pay your debts to the devil in time.

This game was made for Ludum dare 44.
